accent_color_description: Elektu akcentan koloron por personaligi la aspekton de Arcane
custom_accent_color_description: Enigu propran coloron per valida CSS koloraj formatoj (ekz., hex, rgb, hsl).
error_connection_local_docker: Ne povis konektiĝi al la loka Docker-demono
error_connection_local_docker_desc: Ne povis konektiĝi al la loka Docker-demono ĉe {host}. Bonvolu certiĝi ke Docker rulumas kaj alireblas.
error_connection_remote_environment: Ne povis konektiĝi al la fora medio «{name}»
error_connection_remote_environment_desc: Ne povis konektiĝi al la fora medio «{name}» ĉe {url}. Bonvolu ĉertiĝi ke la Arcane-agento rulumas kaj ke la URL korektas.
common_not_found_description: La petita {resource} ne troveblas aŭ ne plu haveblas.
scheduled_prune_description: Automatically clean up unused Docker resources on a schedule

scheduled_prune_volumes_warning: Atentu: Tiu ago povas forigi gravajn datumojn. Aktivigu tiun agordon nur se vi certas.
auto_update_exclude_description: Select containers to exclude from automatic updates.
common_confirm_removal_message: Ĉu forigi tiun {type}? Tiu DETRUA ago ne malfareblas.
common_confirm_destroy_message: Ĉu detrui tiun {type}? Tiu ago estas DETRUA kaj forigos ĉiuj ligitaj rimedoj kaj ne malfareblas.
common_confirm_redeploy_message: Ĉu redisponigi tiun projekton? Ĝi tiros lasajn prakopiojn kaj rekreos la ujoj kiel bezonate.
common_edit_description: Redaktu la detalojn de tiun rimedon

common_labels_description: Metadatenaj etikedoj aldonitaj al ĉi tiu ujo por organizado kaj aŭtomatigo.
auth_no_login_methods_description: Nuntempe neniu ensalut-metodo estas ebligita. Bonvolu kontakti administranton.
auth_processing_login_description: Bonvolu atendi dum kompletigo de via aŭtentikigo.
auth_redirecting_to_login: Redirektante vin reen al la ensaluto…
auth_oidc_invalid_response: Problemo okazis kun la OIDC-ensaluta respondo. Bonvolu reprovi.
auth_oidc_misconfigured: OIDC ne estas ĝuste agordita en la servilo. Bonvolu kontakti administranton.
auth_oidc_userinfo_failed: Ne eblis akiri viajn uzantinformojn de la OIDC-provizanto.
auth_oidc_email_collision: Konto kun via retpoŝto jam ekzistas sed estas ligita al alia OIDC-identeco. Bonvolu kontakti administranton.
auth_oidc_token_error: Eraro okazis dum akiro de ĵetonoj de la OIDC-provizanto.
auth_user_processing_failed: Eraro okazis dum prilaborado de via uzantkonto.
auth_oidc_access_denied: Aliro estis rifuzita. Vi eble nuligis la ensaluton aŭ ne havas permeson.
auth_oidc_state_mismatch: Sekureca validigo malsukcesis. Bonvolu ensaluti denove.
auth_oidc_session_expired: Aŭtentikiga sesio eksvalidiĝis. Bonvolu ensaluti denove.
auth_oidc_callback_error: Eraro okazis dum aŭtentikigo. Bonvolu reprovi.
auth_oidc_network_error: Reta eraro dum aŭtentikigo. Bonvolu kontroli vian konekton kaj reprovi.
auth_oidc_url_generation_failed: Ne eblis generi aŭtentikigan URL-on. Bonvolu reprovi aŭ kontakti vian administranton.
auth_oidc_redirecting_description: Bonvolu atendi dum ni redirektas vin al via identec-provizanto.

volumes_backup_restore_message:
Tio anstataŭigos ĈIUJN datumojn en la portilo «{volumeName}» per la enhavo de ĉi tiu sekurkopio.

Sekureca sekurkopio estos aŭtomate kreita antaŭ la restarigo, por ke vi povu malfari ĉi tiun agon se necese.
volumes_backup_restore_in_use_warning: ⚠️ Atentu: ĉi tiu portilo estas nuntempe uzata de {count} ujo(j). Restarigo dum ujoj rulas povas kaŭzi datuman difekton. Haltigu la ujojn unue aŭ uzu «Restarigi dosierojn» por restarigi specifajn dosierojn.
volumes_backup_restore_success: Portilo estis sukcese restarigita. Sekureca sekurkopio estis kreita antaŭ la restarigo.
volumes_backup_restore_files_success: {count} dosiero(j) estis sukcese restarigitaj. Sekureca sekurkopio estis kreita antaŭ la restarigo.
volumes_backup_safety_info: Sekureca sekurkopio estos aŭtomate kreita antaŭ la restarigo, por ke vi povu malfari ĉi tiun agon se necese.
volumes_backup_overwrite_warning: Elektitaj dosieroj anstataŭigos ekzistantajn dosierojn ĉe tiuj vojoj.
volumes_backup_file_restore_success: Dosiero estis sukcese restarigita. Sekureca sekurkopio estis kreita antaŭ la restarigo.

compose_name_change_not_allowed: La projekta nomo ne povas esti ŝanĝita dum rulado. Bonvolu unue haltigi la projekton.

environments_warning_disabled: Ĉi tiu medio estas malebligita. Vi povas redakti ĝian agordon, sed vi ne povos aliri ĝiajn rimedojn ĝis ĝi estos re-ebligita.
environments_warning_offline: Ĉi tiu medio estas eksterreta aŭ neatingebla. Vi ankoraŭ povas redakti ĝian agordon kaj testi la konekton por diagnozi la problemon.
environments_warning_no_settings: Ne eblis ŝargi agordojn por ĉi tiu medio. Ĝi eble estas eksterreta, malebligita aŭ havas nevalidan URL-on. Vi ankoraŭ povas redakti bazajn medi-detalojn.
environments_local_setting_disabled: Ĉi tiu agordo ne povas esti ŝanĝita por la loka medio
environments_health_check_description: Automatic monitoring of environment connectivity and status
environments_health_check_interval_descr: How often to check environment connectivity (in minutes). Default: 2 minutes.
environments_cannot_switch_disabled: Ne eblas ŝanĝi al malebligita medio
environments_agent_config_description: Regeneri API-ŝlosilon kaj deplojan agordon por ĉi tiu agento
environments_api_key_save_warning: Konservu ĉi tiun API-ŝlosilon. Ĝi ne estos montrata denove. Ĝisdatigu vian agenton per la nova ŝlosilo.
environments_regenerate_warning_message: Regenerado de la API-ŝlosilo nuligos la aktualan ŝlosilon. La agento devos esti ĝisdatigita per la nova ŝlosilo por rekonekti.
environments_regenerate_dialog_message: Tio kreos novan API-ŝlosilon por ĉi tiu medio. La aktuala API-ŝlosilo estos tuj nuligita, kaj la agento perdos konekton ĝis vi ĝisdatigos ĝin per la nova ŝlosilo.
users_create_description: Add a new user to your system with the required permissions
users_password_leave_empty: Leave empty to keep current password
users_password_description_oidc: Password is managed by your OIDC provider
users_password_description_edit: Leave empty to keep current password
users_display_name_description: Optional display name for the user
users_administrator_description: Grant administrator privileges to this user
events_subtitle: Monitor events that have taken place in Arcane.
settings_subtitle: Configure and customize your Arcane experience
settings_no_results_description: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
general_projects_directory_help: Directory where Docker Compose files are stored (this is inside the container). MUST be an absolute path!
general_base_url_help: The Base URL for your docker host. Used when opening containers from the service links
general_user_avatars_description: Control Gravatar usage for profile images.
security_subtitle: Aggregated vulnerability findings across all images in this environment.
security_description: Configure authentication methods, session timeouts, and other security-related options.
security_local_auth_description: Username and password stored by Arcane. Keep enabled as a fallback.
security_oidc_forced_disabled_tooltip: OIDC is disabled by server environment variables and cannot be changed here.
security_oidc_forced_managed_tooltip: OIDC is managed by server environment variables.
security_oidc_client_secret_help: Leave blank to keep the existing secret
security_oidc_merge_accounts_description: Allow OIDC logins to merge with existing local accounts by matching email addresses
security_oidc_merge_accounts_alert_descr: When enabled, users signing in with OIDC will automatically link to any existing local account with the same email address. This allows users to log in with either method. Existing accounts will gain OIDC access without creating duplicates. Warning: Admin permissions will be overwritten based on OIDC claims during login - local admins may lose privileges if OIDC doesn't grant admin, or regular users may gain admin from OIDC claims.
security_session_timeout_description: Inactive sessions will be logged out automatically (15–1440 minutes).
security_password_policy_standard_toolti: 10+ chars with upper, lower, and a number.
security_password_policy_strong_tooltip: 12+ chars with upper, lower, number, and symbol.
security_trivy_image_description: Container image used for vulnerability scans.
security_trivy_image_note: Note: This must be a Trivy image (for example, ghcr.io/aquasecurity/trivy:latest).
security_enable_one_provider: Enable at least one authentication provider.
security_enable_one_provider_error: At least one authentication provider must be enabled.
security_form_validation_error: Please check the form for errors.
security_oidc_required_fields: Client ID and Issuer URL are required to enable OIDC.
security_local_enabled_info: Local Authentication enabled to ensure at least one provider is active.
security_auto_login_enabled_description: Auto-login is currently enabled via environment variables. Authentication settings are disabled because users are automatically logged in with pre-configured credentials. To modify authentication settings, disable auto-login in your server configuration.
security_scan_all_success: Started scanning {count} images. Results will appear as scans complete.
security_scan_all_failed: Failed to start scan for {count} images
jobs_description: Configure how often Arcane background jobs run. Changes apply immediately.
jobs_moved_description: Job schedules are now managed per environment. Select an environment to edit schedules and run jobs.
jobs_environment_scope_description: These schedules and controls apply only to the currently selected environment.
jobs_event_cleanup_description: How often Arcane deletes events older than 36 hours
jobs_analytics_description: Only runs in production, and only if analytics are enabled
jobs_environment_health_description: Checks the health and connectivity of all enabled environments
jobs_event_cleanup_name_description: Removes old system events to maintain database performance
jobs_analytics_heartbeat_description: Sends usage statistics and telemetry data
jobs_auto_update_description: Automatically updates containers when new images are available
jobs_image_polling_description: Checks container registries for new image versions
jobs_scheduled_prune_description: Removes unused containers, images, volumes, and networks
jobs_gitops_sync_description: Synchronizes project state with configured git repositories
jobs_filesystem_watcher_description: Monitors project directory for changes and syncs automatically
jobs_cron_expression_help: Enter a valid cron expression (seconds minutes hours day month weekday)
jobs_cron_invalid: Cron expression must have 6 parts (seconds minutes hours day month weekday)
jobs_schedule_update_unavailable: Schedule updates are not available for this job
docker_default_shell_description: The default shell to use when opening a terminal in a container
docker_shell_custom_path_help: Enter the full path to the shell executable
docker_prune_all_description: Remove all images not referenced by containers and include named, unused volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_dangling_description: Remove only dangling (untagged) images and anonymous volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_mode_description: Choose how unused images and volumes should be pruned.
docker_max_upload_size_description: Maximum size in megabytes for image archive uploads (50-5000 MB)
docker_enable_polling_description: Periodically check registries for newer image versions
docker_polling_interval_description: How often to check for new images (5-10080 minutes)
docker_auto_update_description: Automatically update containers when newer images are found
docker_auto_update_interval_description: How often to perform automatic updates (5-1440 minutes)
docker_auto_inject_env_description: Automatically inject project .env variables into all containers
docker_rate_limit_warning_description: Polling intervals below 30 minutes may trigger registry rate limits. Prefer longer intervals in production.
appearance_description: Customize the look and feel of Arcane
appearance_language_current_user_descrip: Language preference is saved for the current user only.
appearance_theme_current_user_descriptio: Theme preference is saved for the current user only.
navigation_mode_description: Choose between floating navigation that overlays content or docked navigation that takes up screen space
navigation_show_labels_description: Display text labels below navigation icons for better clarity and accessibility
navigation_sidebar_hover_expansion_descr: When enabled, hovering over the collapsed sidebar will temporarily expand it to show full labels. When disabled, tooltips will appear instead for a cleaner, fixed-width navigation.
navigation_keyboard_shortcuts_descriptio: Enable keyboard shortcuts for quick navigation (e.g., Mod+1 for Dashboard). When disabled, shortcut hints will also be hidden from tooltips.
disk_usage_settings_description: Configure which directory to monitor for disk usage metrics.
disk_usage_save_failed: Failed to update disk usage path
timeouts_settings_description: Configure operation timeouts for slow networks or hardware. All values are in seconds.
docker_api_timeout_description: Timeout for Docker list operations in seconds (default: 30)
docker_image_pull_timeout_description: Timeout for Docker image pulls in seconds (default: 600 = 10 minutes)
trivy_scan_timeout_description: Timeout for Trivy vulnerability scans on Docker images.
git_operation_timeout_description: Timeout for Git clone/fetch operations in seconds (default: 300 = 5 minutes)
http_client_timeout_description: Default timeout for HTTP requests in seconds (default: 30)
registry_timeout_description: Timeout for container registry operations in seconds (default: 30)
proxy_request_timeout_description: Timeout for proxied requests in seconds (default: 60)
customize_subtitle: Customize templates, registries, and configuration defaults
customize_try_adjusting: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
templates_subtitle: Manage Docker Compose template sources and registries
templates_registries_section_description: Connect to remote sources for community and custom templates
templates_alert_remote_registries_descri: Add remote template registries to access community templates. Registries should provide a JSON manifest with template definitions and download URLs.
templates_community_registry_description: Get started quickly with our community registry containing popular templates:
templates_add_registry_description: Add a remote template registry to access community templates.
templates_registry_url_description: URL to the registry JSON manifest
templates_enable_registry_description: Enable this registry to fetch templates
templates_registry_invalid_format: Invalid registry format: missing required fields (name, templates)
templates_choose_description: Browse templates from your registries or local downloads. Scroll to see more, select to use immediately, or download for offline use.
templates_group_by_registry_description: Enable Collapsible Sections for each registry
templates_defaults_description: Customize the default Docker Compose and environment templates used when creating new projects. These templates will be pre-populated in the new project form.
templates_validation_error: Please fix validation errors before saving
registries_subtitle: Configure access credentials for private Docker registries and container repositories
registries_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected registry(ies)? This action cannot be undone.
registries_info_description: Common registry URLs and authentication requirements
registries_auth_notes_bullet_docker_hub: Docker Hub requires credentials for private repositories
registries_auth_notes_bullet_github: GitHub uses personal access tokens as passwords
registries_auth_notes_bullet_anonymous: Some registries support anonymous access for public images
registries_auth_notes_bullet_encrypted: Credentials are encrypted and stored securely
registries_add_description: Enter the details for the new container registry.
registries_edit_description: Update the details for this container registry.
registries_url_description: Leave empty or use 'docker.io' for Docker Hub
registries_token_keep_placeholder: Leave empty to keep current token
registries_token_description: Use a Personal Access Token or your password if the registry supports it.
git_subtitle: Manage Git repositories and automated synchronization to projects
git_repositories_subtitle: Configure Git repository connections for Git synchronization
git_repository_remove_message: Are you sure you want to remove this repository? This will also remove all associated sync configurations.
git_repository_ssh_key_placeholder: Paste your SSH private key here
git_repository_ssh_host_key_verification: How to verify the SSH server's host key. Set SSH_KNOWN_HOSTS env to customize the known_hosts file path.
git_repository_ssh_host_key_strict_descr: Require host key in known_hosts file
git_repository_ssh_host_key_accept_new_d: Auto-accept and save new host keys to known_hosts
git_sync_remove_message: Are you sure you want to remove this sync configuration?

git_sync_import_json_invalid_array: Input must be a JSON array

git_sync_branch_manual_hint: Enter branch name manually or select a repository to load branches

git_managed_readonly_alert: This project is managed by Git. The compose file and project name cannot be edited here. Changes must be made in the connected Git repository.
git_managed_env_note: The environment file (.env) can still be edited in Arcane to provide runtime configuration.
git_environment_card_description: Configure Git syncs to automatically deploy Docker Compose projects from Git repositories to this environment.
variables_subtitle: Manage global environment variables that are available to all projects
variables_about_description: These variables are stored in .env.global at the root of your projects directory and are available to all Docker Compose projects.
variables_no_variables_description: Click "Add" to create your first variable

oidc_admin_role_mapping_description: Mapu OIDC-aserton por doni la adminan rolon.
oidc_skip_tls_verify_description: Malŝalti TLS-atestilan kontrolon por OIDC-finpunktoj. Uzu kun ATENTO.
oidc_auto_redirect_description: Aŭtomate redirekti al OIDC-provizanto ĉe la ensaluta paĝo.
oidc_redirect_uri_description: Agordu ĉi tiun redirektan URI ĉe via OIDC-provizanto:
oidc_provider_name_description: Propra nomo montrata sur la ensaluta butono
oidc_provider_logo_url_description: Propra emblema bildo por anstataŭigi la defaŭltan OIDC-ikono»
prune_confirm_description: Elektu la rimedojn por elpurigi. Ĉi tiu ago konstante forigas neuzatajn datumojn kaj ne povas esti malfarita.
prune_volumes_guidance: Ebligu nur se vi certas ke neniu grava datumo troviĝas en neuzataj portiloj.
prune_volumes_warning_description: Elpurigo de portiloj konstante forigas datumojn. Certigu ke vi havas sekurkopiojn»
network_driver_description: Elektu la tipon de reta pelilo
network_labels_description: Enigu pliajn etikedojn kiel ŝlosilo=valoro, unu po linio
network_driver_options_description: Enigu pelil-specifajn opciojn kiel ŝlosilo=valoro, unu po lini»
create_volume_description: Enigu la detalojn por la nova Docker-portilo.
volume_driver_description: Elektu la stokadan pelilon por via portilo
volume_driver_options_description: Enigu pelil-specifajn opciojn kiel ŝlosilo=valoro, unu po linio
file_drop_zone_drag_drop: Trenu kaj faligu dosierojn ĉi tien, aŭ alklaku por elekti dosierojn
polling_hourly_description: Check for new images every 60 minutes
polling_daily_description: Check for new images every 1440 minutes
polling_weekly_description: Check for new images every 10080 minutes
use_custom_polling_value: Use a custom polling value between 5-10080 minutes
ui_config_disabled_description: Agordoj devas esti mastrumataj per mediaj variabloj.
registries_remove_message: Are you sure you want to remove registry {url}?
users_delete_selected_message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected user(s)?
users_delete_user_message: Are you sure you want to delete user "{username}"?
events_delete_selected_message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected event(s)?
events_delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete event "{title}"?
notifications_read_only_description: Settings are read-only in this environment. Configuration changes are disabled.
notifications_discord_description: Send notifications to Discord when container updates are detected
notifications_discord_webhook_id_help: The webhook ID from your Discord webhook URL (found after /webhooks/)
notifications_discord_token_help: The token from your Discord webhook URL (the second part after the webhook ID)
notifications_discord_username_help: Display name for the notification bot
notifications_discord_avatar_url_help: Avatar image URL for the notification bot
notifications_email_description: Send notifications via email when container updates are detected
notifications_email_from_address_help: Email address to send notifications from
notifications_email_to_addresses_help: Comma-separated list of email addresses to send notifications to
notifications_event_image_update_descrip: Notify when a new image version is available
notifications_event_container_update_des: Notify when a container is actually updated/restarted
notifications_event_vulnerability_found_: Notify when a scan finds a vulnerability that has a fixed version (CVE link, severity, image, fixed version)
notifications_email_tls_mode_description: StartTLS (default) upgrades from plain connection. SSL/TLS uses encryption from start. None uses no encryption.
notifications_apprise_description: Configure Apprise API for unified notifications across multiple services
notifications_apprise_api_url_help: URL of your Apprise API endpoint
notifications_apprise_image_tag_help: Optional tag for image update notifications
notifications_apprise_container_tag_help: Optional tag for container update notifications
notifications_signal_description: Send notifications via Signal Messenger through a Signal API server
notifications_signal_host_help: Hostname or IP address of your Signal REST API server
notifications_signal_host_required: Host is required when Signal is enabled
notifications_signal_port_help: Port number of your Signal REST API server
notifications_signal_auth_help: Provide either Basic Auth (username + password) OR Bearer Token authentication, not both
notifications_signal_auth_required: Either Basic Auth (username + password) or API Token is required
notifications_signal_auth_conflict: Cannot use both Basic Auth and API Token authentication
notifications_signal_source_help: Your Signal phone number with country code (must start with +)
notifications_signal_source_required: Source phone number is required when Signal is enabled
notifications_signal_source_format: Source phone number must start with + and include country code
notifications_signal_recipients_help: Comma-separated list of phone numbers (with +) or Signal group IDs
notifications_signal_recipients_required: At least one recipient is required when Signal is enabled
notifications_signal_disable_tls_descrip: Disable TLS/SSL for Signal REST API connection (not recommended for production)
notifications_slack_description: Send notifications to Slack channels or direct messages
notifications_slack_token_help: API token (xoxb-, xoxp-) or webhook token (hook-)
notifications_slack_token_required: Token is required when Slack is enabled
notifications_slack_bot_name_help: Display name for the bot in Slack
notifications_slack_channel_help: Override default channel (include # for public channels)
notifications_slack_icon_help: Emoji (e.g., :robot_face:) or image URL for bot avatar
notifications_slack_color_help: Hex color code for message sidebar
notifications_slack_thread_ts_help: Reply in a thread (ts value of parent message)
notifications_ntfy_description: Send notifications via ntfy.sh when container updates are detected
notifications_ntfy_port_help: Port number for ntfy server (leave empty or 0 for default)
notifications_ntfy_topic_help: Topic name to publish notifications to (required, treat as a password)
notifications_ntfy_username_help: Username for authentication (if required by server)
notifications_ntfy_password_help: Password for authentication (if required by server)
notifications_ntfy_priority_help: Notification priority level (Min=1, Low=2, Default=3, High=4, Max/Urgent=5)
notifications_ntfy_tags_help: Comma-separated list of tags (may map to emojis on supported clients)
notifications_ntfy_icon_help: URL to use as notification icon
notifications_ntfy_cache_help: Allow ntfy server to cache messages (enabled by default)
notifications_ntfy_firebase_help: Send notifications via Firebase (enabled by default)
notifications_pushover_description: Send notifications via Pushover when container updates are detected
notifications_pushover_devices_help: Comma-separated list of device names. Leave empty to send to all devices.
notifications_pushover_priority_help: Priority level (-2 to 2). Higher values are more urgent.
notifications_gotify_description: Send notifications via Gotify when container updates are detected
notifications_gotify_host_help: Your Gotify server hostname or IP address
notifications_gotify_port_help: Server port. Leave at 0 to use default (443 for HTTPS, 80 for HTTP)
notifications_gotify_path_help: Optional subpath if Gotify is installed in a subdirectory
notifications_gotify_priority_help: Priority level (-2 to 10). Higher values are more urgent
notifications_gotify_disable_tls_help: Use HTTP instead of HTTPS (not recommended for production)
notifications_matrix_description: Send notifications via Matrix when container updates are detected
notifications_matrix_host_help: Your Matrix server hostname or IP address
notifications_matrix_port_help: Server port. Leave at 0 to use default (443 for HTTPS, 80 for HTTP)
notifications_matrix_rooms_help: Your Matrix room ID (prefixed with '!') or alias
notifications_matrix_username_help: Username for authentication (emtpy when token is used)
notifications_matrix_disable_tls_help: Use HTTP instead of HTTPS (not recommended for production)
notifications_generic_description: Send notifications to any webhook endpoint that accepts HTTP POST requests
notifications_generic_webhook_url_help: The full webhook endpoint URL including protocol (http:// or https://)
notifications_generic_method_help: HTTP method to use for requests (default: POST)
notifications_generic_title_key_help: JSON key name for the notification title (default: title)
notifications_generic_message_key_help: JSON key name for the notification message (default: message)
notifications_generic_custom_headers_hel: Comma-separated list of custom headers in format 'Key:Value' (e.g., Authorization:Bearer token)
notifications_unsaved_changes_descriptio: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to save them before testing?
first_login_description: For security reasons, you must change the default password before continuing.
first_login_error_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
upgrade_confirm_description: You are about to upgrade Arcane to version {version}.
upgrade_step_pull: Pull the latest Arcane Docker image
upgrade_step_start: Start a new container with the updated image
upgrade_step_preserve: Preserve all your data and settings
upgrade_warning_interruption: This will cause a brief service interruption (~30 seconds)
upgrade_success: Upgrade initiated successfully. Arcane will restart shortly.
upgrade_wait_message: The upgrade is in progress. This may take a few minutes depending on your connection speed.
upgrade_reload_auto: Page will reload automatically in {countdown} seconds
upgrade_remote_description: You are about to upgrade {targetDescription} to v{version}.
upgrade_status_pulling: Downloading new version and preparing to restart...
upgrade_wait_info: This may take 30-60 seconds. The page will reload automatically when ready.
api_key_name_placeholder: Enter a name for this API key
api_key_name_description: A friendly name to identify this API key
api_key_description_help: Additional details about what this API key is used for
api_key_expires_at_description: When this API key will expire. Leave empty for a non-expiring key
api_key_create_description: Create a new API key for programmatic access
api_key_edit_description: Update the details of the API key "{name}"
api_key_created_description: Copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
api_key_important_warning: This is the only time you will see this key. Make sure to copy it and store it securely.
api_key_page_description: Manage API keys for programmatic access to Arcane. View the API Reference for usage details.
api_key_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete the API key "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
api_key_delete_selected_message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} API key(s)? This action cannot be undone.
project_view_description: Switch between classic side-by-side layout and tree view
environments_created_description: Use the API key and deployment snippets below to set up your agent.
environments_api_key_warning: Save this API key securely. It will not be shown again.
environments_create_new_agent_descriptio: Generate an API key and deployment snippets for a new agent.
environments_agent_address_description: The URL where your agent will be accessible
notifications_event_prune_report_descrip: Receive a summary report when a scheduled prune operation completes
